STEPS: detect task -> apply META -> verify -> answer.
META_EXPLAIN: if contains 'Explain' -> return definition.
META_QA: if starts 'Q:' -> answer using context only.
META_MATH: if contains 'Compute'/'If x=' -> exact arithmetic.
META_LR: if about LR/OLS/residual -> use LR facts.
[GUARDRAIL_ON]
GUARDRAIL: if not verifiable -> 'I don't know'.
LR_FACTS: y=beta0+beta1x; residual=y-y_hat; OLS minimizes SSE.
